info.name: Flight Rising Scry Dresser
info.description:
Use dragon scries in the dressing room, complete with skins/accents! You can find skin/accent URLs in the FR item DB -> https://items.kanojo.de/

INSTRUCTIONS: After installing, you need to edit the style in order to add your scry and accent URLs. In Chrome this can be done by clicking the pencil under the style's name in the Stylish dropdown.
